content: How can I undo leanproject upgrade-mathlib please? Too many parts of my code stopped working with the new version; I'd like to go back. But how?
Are you using git to manage your work?
If so, then you can rollback the changes to leanproject.toml
Then I think leanproject get-mathlib-cache will clean up the oleans
Martin Dvořák has marked this topic as resolved.
Of course, the best thing to do would be to fix the errors in your project, since the longer you wait the harder upgrading will be
This is an unimportant project which I plan to never upgrade. I used the previous advice and it worked. Thanks!
